snippet: The parents of Trayvon Martin, 17, have settled a wrongful-death lawsuit against the homeowners’ association in the gated community where George Zimmerman shot him.
abstract: Parents of Trayvon Martin, unarmed teenager who was shot by George Zimmerman in 2012, settle a wrongful-death lawsuit against the homeowners’ association in gated community in Sanford, Fla, where he was killed.
lead_paragraph: The parents of Trayvon Martin, 17, have settled a wrongful-death lawsuit against the homeowners’ association in the gated community where George Zimmerman shot him.

headline.seo: Trayvon Martin’s Parents Settle Wrongful Death Suit
headline.main: Settlement Is Reached With Family in Slaying
headline.print_headline: Settlement Is Reached With Family In Slaying
